tool_description: An API showing all the latest Uyghur news around the world
name: Uyghur News Live
title: Uyghur News Live

api_list.name: Get all Uyghur news from bbc
api_list.description: Get all Uyghur news from bbc
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uyghur-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/bbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uyghur-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://uyghur-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uyghur-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
